name: Diamond
description: A person's best friend.

name: Havenite
description: A mysterious and beautiful gem, found only in the earth beneath Sun Haven.

name: Black Diamond
description: A rare black diamond. They're not found very often and are considered a miner's blessing.

name: Mithril Ore
description: I can smelt this into a bar.

name: Fire Crystal
description: The elemental force of fire, hardened into a crystal.

name: Earth Crystal
description: The elemental force of earth, hardened into a crystal.

name: Water Crystal
description: The elemental force of water, hardened into a crystal.

name: Enhanced Adamant Bar
description: An adamant bar, enhanced with Withergate concrete and dark magic.

name: Enchanted Adamant Bar
description: An adamant bar, enchanted with Elven magic.

name: Mithril Bar
description: A bar of refined mithril, though beautiful to the eyes its strength and durability are almost unmatched.

name: Hardwood Beam
description: A solid beam of Hardwood, usable in crafting. Beam me up!

name: Dragon Scale
description: Though comparatively tiny compared to a scale from a fully grown dragon, it's still harder than mithril.

name: Golden Wool
description: A bundle of pure golden wool, this golden animal product will sell for a high price.

name: Golden Log
description: Who needs gold leaf when you've got gold log? This golden product will sell for a high price.

name: Golden Feather
description: Solid gold, yet no heavier than a normal feather. This golden product will sell for a high price.

name: Golden Silk
description: Luxurious silk woven of pure gold. This golden product will sell for a high price.

name: Sandstone Ore
description: A dusty chunk of sandstone, you wouldn't want to drop this on your toes.

name: Sandstone Fish
description: Though an average size fish, its solid sandstone scales make it quite heavy.

name: Classic Mailbox
description: A stadard issue mailbox from the Four Region Postal Service (FRPS).

name: Smithed Mailbox
description: A customized mailbox for your farm.

name: Moon Mailbox
description: A customized mailbox for your farm.

name: Birdhouse Mailbox
description: A customized mailbox for your farm.

name: Orange Top Mailbox
description: A customized mailbox for your farm.

name: Flower Mailbox
description: A customized mailbox for your farm.

name: Pink Bunny Mailbox
description: A customized mailbox for your farm.

name: Demon Mailbox
description: A customized mailbox for your farm.

name: Golden Pomegranate
description: Adventurers tell tales of shiny golden pomegranates, visible only to seasoned explorers.

name: Golden Apple
description: A shiny golden apple. This golden product will sell for a high price.

name: Golden Orange
description: A shiny golden orange. This golden product will sell for a high price.

name: Golden Blueberry
description: Shiny golden blueberries. This golden product will sell for a high price.

name: Golden Strawberry
description: Shiny golden strawberries. This golden product will sell for a high price.

name: Golden Peach
description: A shiny golden peach. This golden product will sell for a high price.

name: Golden Raspberry
description: Shiny golden raspberries. This golden product will sell for a high price.

name: Advanced Attack Potion
description: Imbued with the incredible strength of the dragons themselves, this potion boosts the strength of physical attacks for a short time.

name: Advanced Defense Potion
description: Imbued with the indomitable spirit of the dragons themselves, this potion boosts defense for a short time.

name: Advanced Spell Damage Potion
description: Imbued with the arcanic might of the dragons themselves, this potion boosts spell casting potency for a short time.

name: Bat Window
description: Found yourself stuck choosing between getting a window or getting bats? Why not get BOTH? You deserve it.

name: Incredible Spell Damage Potion
description:
A powerful potion brewed from the candy gems found in the monsterfolk lands.

"You want my favor... yet you offer me mere candy? Monsterfolk... are so foolish." - Dynus

name: Incredible Attack Potion
description:
A powerful potion brewed from the candy gems found in the monsterfolk lands.

"Such power this 'candy' possesses... perhaps the monsterfolk have something to offer me after all." - Dynus

name: Incredible Defense Potion
description:
A powerful potion brewed from the candy gems found in the monsterfolk lands.

"The monsterfolk shall have a home in Withergate... and I shall have their tribute." - Dynus

name: Withergate Mining Potion
description: Made of melted candy and lots of sugar, it's the perfect energy boost for breaking stuff faster as you work in the Withergate mines.

name: Butter
description: Half the ingredients of buttered toast.

name: Hearty Armor Pie
description: Soldiers of the Great Army have one day they look forward to over all others: pie day at the mess hall.

name: Lemon Meringue
description: It's no fun to mix by hand, but this fluffy cream is (mostly) worth the effort.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: You should always have cake on your birthday! In fact, maybe you should have a cake every day? You know, just to stay on the safe side.

name: Carrot Cake
description: You should always have cake on your birthday! In fact, maybe you should have a cake every day? You know, just to stay on the safe side.

name: Withercake
description: A delicacy enjoyed by the Demon race. Made with ingredients of questionable edibility, it is most definitely an acquired taste.

name: Cheese Souffle
description: In the old days, souffles were prone to deflating if disturbed. With a little mana, however, you can have the perfect souffle all the time!

name: Caramel Creme Brulee
description: A baked custard dessert, torched with just a touch of fire magic. 'Creme Brulee' is a fancy way of saying it's slightly burnt!

name: Apple Crisp Ice Cream
description: Just like hot apple crisp straight from the oven, only it's ice cold and in a cone.

name: Blueberry Ice Cream
description: Ice cream flavored with fresh blueberries. Perfect for a hot summer day - or any other time!

name: Strawberry Ice Cream
description: Ice cream flavored with fresh strawberry. Perfect for a hot summer day - or any other time!

name: Berry Ice Cream
description: Ice cream flavored with fresh berries. Perfect for a hot summer day - or any other time!

name: Raspberry Sorbet
description: Sor-bet? Sor-bit? Well, however you say it, it's delicious and refreshing!

name: Seaweed Ice Cream
description: An ice cream flavor that proves just because you CAN, it doesn't mean you SHOULD.

name: Sandy Ice Cream
description: It looks just like an ice cream you dropped on the beach! It also tastes like one, too.

name: Chocolate Ice Cream
description: The definitive, classic ice cream flavor that is second to none (except for vanilla).

name: The Prehistoric Special
description: A tooth-breaking dessert straight from the stone age.

name: Cinnamon Ice Cream
description: The spicy cinnamon mixed with the sweet ice cream produces a fairly complex flavor profile. Yummy!

name: Neapolitan Ice Cream
description: Something is definitely fishy about this multi-colored ice cream.

name: Glass of Pure Water
description: When cleansed of impurities, simple water has a surpsingly potent restorative effect.

name: Candy Cane Ale
description: Sickly sweet peppermint ale enjoyed around the holidays (by anyone who can stomach it, at least).

name: Cinnamon Spice Latte
description: A new style of drink from the Great City, it didn't take long to spread across the four regions.

name: Magically Delicious Drink
description: How is this drink so delicious? Magic. Literally, it's magic. A mage cast a magic spell on it. That's how.

name: Simple Magic Fertilizer
description: Fertilizer rich with the magic of water, increasing your crop's chance to stay watered over night.

name: Hear's Help Amulet
description: A strange amulet the likes of which you've never seen before. It senses its wearer's life force and emits a healing effect when it detects dangerously low levels.

name: Hungry Adventurer's Amulet
description: A ceremonial fork worn on a linen chain, no better accessory is there for declaring one's affinity for food.

name: Amulet of Time
description: A pocketwatch on a silver chain, enchanted with incredibly strong chronomancy. Its wearer can slip through time, controlling the outcome of battles.

name: Diamond Amulet
description: A piece of carved turquoise, hymns and mantras have been placed on it to impart protection and endurance.

name: Rusted Amulet
description: Rusted from untold ages spent under water, at least it isn't the WORST thing you could find in a birdbath...

name: Candy Necklace
description: A necklace of candy gems, woven by an artistic Monsterfolk. Is it meant to frighten enemies, or just look stylish?

name: Barn
description: Your farm animals will stay nice and cozy in this sturdy wooden barn.

name: Cloud Bed
description: It's like sleeping on a cloud. No, literally. This bed is like sleeping on a cloud.

name: Weapons Rack
description: A true warrior should always have a weapon within arm's length.

name: Painter's Design Easel
description: Bring out your inner painter with this artsy easel.

name: Red Quilted Couch
description: It must have taken a long time to quilt an entire couch.

name: Camp Fire
description: Who doesn't love to sit around a good fire?

name: Dynus Victory Trophy
description: A glorious golden cup, commemorating your victory against the Moon Dragon.

name: Dynus Plushie
description: A plushie of legendary size, perfectly capturing the Moon Dragon's majesty and might.

name: Wishing Well
description: Imbued with a mystical power not quite of this world, this well is rumored to be one of Dynus's most prized treasures.

name: Large Fishing Net
description: Automatically catches fish in the river, ponds and beach of your farm. This net covers a lot of water, which means it's going to catch a lot of fish.

name: Wizard Crafting Table
description: A mage's study desk, capable of conjuring mystical recipes. Brews and transmutates cheaper than the alchemy tables, among other things.

name: Withergate Totem
description: An enchanted totem imbued with Withergate mana, it enriches the soil and allows Withergate crops to grow in Sun Haven.

name: Nel'Vari Totem
description: An enchanted totem imbued with Nel'Varian mana, it enriches the soil and allows Nel'Vari crops to grow in Sun Haven.

name: Advanced Furniture Table
description:
A specialized carpentry bench, you can make furniture and decorations with this. This table contains advanced recipes for experienced crafters.
More expensive than buying furniture in a store, but the convenience is nice.

name: Ice Cream Cart
description: Kept freezing cold thanks to a specialized form of water magic, you can freeze ingredients into icy treats with this.

name: Sun Haven Totem
description: An enchanted totem imbued with Sun Haven mana, it enriches the soil and allows Sun Haven crops to grow in Withergate or Nel'Vari.

name: Snappy Plant
description: Snips and bites at seemingly anything that comes close to it, a favored houseplant for many in Withergate.

name: Pepper
description: Some people argue that the spice is an acquired taste, but this fiery pepper is great for adding an edge to any dish.

name: Dragon Fruit
description: Beloved by dragons and anyone else who can tolerate the spice of this fruit's fiery seeds.

name: Hops
description: Tiny little flower buds that are crucial to the brewing process.

name: Ghost Pepper
description: If you're brave enough to try one of these ultra hot peppers just remember to drink milk and not water!

name: Stormelon
description: A species of melon created by Elemental enchanters that contains the elemental force of storm.

name: Chocoberry
description: A standard semi-sweet chocolate on their own, but using them in recipes brings out their true sweetness.

name: Heart Berry
description: A berry whose juice is often served as a drink during romantic meals.

name: Cranberry
description: Cranberries are highly valued for the sweet sauce they're cooked into for holiday feasts.

name: Green Beans
description: They're beans and they are most certainly green.

name: Peas
description: Pass the peas, please.

name: Cotton
description: It may be second to wool, but cotton is never forgotten.

name: Honeysuckle
description: Flowering vines that are found native in the tundras of the Northern Region.

name: Candy Cane
description: The most popular winter candy.

name: Snow Pea
description: There's no peas like snow peas.

name: Sun Orb
description: A burning orb of energy, its warmth alone is revitalizing.

name: Lily
description: These beautiful flowers were brought to these lands from a far away continent. They grow very well here despite not being a native species.

name: Lotus
description: The flowers of the lotus plant are known for representing renewal, blooming each day with a refreshed beauty.

name: Fishing Permit Tier 3
description: An official piece of paper permitting you to deploy a high number of fishing nets. Increase fishing net capacity by 6. Only one tier 3 fishing permit can be used per world.

name: Land Permit Tier 3
description: An official piece of paper permitting you to deploy a high number of crops. Increase crop capacity by 25. Only one tier 3 land permit can be used per world.

name: Large Mana Potion
description: A potion of distilled mana essense, it provides a quick boost to your energy.

name: Magic Potion
description: A potion of distilled mana essense, it provides a quick boost to your energy.

name: Large Magic Potion
description: A potion of distilled mana essense, it provides a quick boost to your energy.

name: Spell Damage Potion
description: A potion of distilled mana essense, it provides a quick boost to your energy.

name: Spiked Salmon Sashimi
description: Seafood prepared in an exotic fashion... where did the Demons of Withergate learn this type of culinary style?

name: Ghoul Fish Roll
description: Seafood prepared in an exotic fashion... where did the Demons of Withergate learn this type of culinary style?

name: Dumbo Octopus Takoyaki
description: Seafood prepared in an exotic fashion... where did the Demons of Withergate learn this type of culinary style?

name: Jack'o'fin Sashimi
description: Seafood prepared in an exotic fashion... where did the Demons of Withergate learn this type of culinary style?

name: Dead Eye Shrimp Cocktail
description: In Demonic these cocktails are known as hors d'oeuvres, basically fancy party food for fancy Demon parties.

name: Electric Eel Sushi
description: Seafood prepared in an exotic fashion... where did the Demons of Withergate learn this type of culinary style?

name: Brain Jelly Salad
description: It wiggles, it jiggles, it... tastes about as good as you'd imagine.

name: Kraken Stew
description: A monstrous stew, perfect for anyone with a monstrous appetite!

name: Redfinned Pincher Sushi Roll
description: Seafood prepared in an exotic fashion... where did the Demons of Withergate learn this type of culinary style?

name: Ghosthead Tuna Sashimi
description: Seafood prepared in an exotic fashion... where did the Demons of Withergate learn this type of culinary style?

name: Living Jelly Salad
description: A popular dish at Monsterfolk picnics or family gatherings, normally avoided by the kids.

name: Albino Squid Rings
description: Even for squid these things are a little on the gooey side, but they're surprisingly tasty.

name: Devilishly Good Stew
description: A stew so tasty that even an angel would be tempted.

name: Duorado Double Roll
description: Seafood prepared in an exotic fashion... where did the Demons of Withergate learn this type of culinary style?

name: Water Bear Soup
description: Waiter, what's the water bear doing in my soup?

name: Viperfish Sashimi
description: Seafood prepared in an exotic fashion... where did the Demons of Withergate learn this type of culinary style?

name: Snappy Juice
description: Juice with a real snap! No, really.

name: Bubble Tea
description: Naturally bubbly, it tickles your lip when you try to drink it.

name: Golden Tree Seeds Recipe
description: Unlocks the ability to craft Golden Tree Seeds for all players!

name: Red Rose Bouquet Recipe
description: Unlock the ability to craft Red Rose Bouquets for all players!

name: Blue Rose Bouquet Recipe
description: Unlock the ability to craft Blue Rose Bouquets for all players!

name: Legendary Fish Bait Recipe
description: Unlock the ability to craft Legendary Fish Bait for all players!

name: Simple Magic Fertilizer Recipe
description: Unlock the ability to craft Simple Magic Fertilizer for all players!

name: Advanced Magic Fertilizer Recipe
description: Unlock the ability to craft Advanced Magic Fertilizer for all players!

name: Wizard's Crafting Table Recipe
description: Unlock the ability to craft Wizard's Crafting Tables for all players!

name: Moonplant Cola
description: Built on a swamp, Withergate needed a method to purify and flavor its drinking water. That, my friends, is where soda comes in...

name: Eggplant Cola
description: Built on a swamp, Withergate needed a method to purify and flavor its drinking water. That, my friends, is where soda comes in...

name: Spikey Soda
description: Built on a swamp, Withergate needed a method to purify and flavor its drinking water. That, my friends, is where soda comes in...

name: Pumpkin Soda
description: Built on a swamp, Withergate needed a method to purify and flavor its drinking water. That, my friends, is where soda comes in...

name: Tombmelon Soda
description: Built on a swamp, Withergate needed a method to purify and flavor its drinking water. That, my friends, is where soda comes in...

name: Kraken Cola
description: Built on a swamp, Withergate needed a method to purify and flavor its drinking water. That, my friends, is where soda comes in...

name: Sucker Soda
description: Built on a swamp, Withergate needed a method to purify and flavor its drinking water. That, my friends, is where soda comes in...

name: Sweet Melon Soda
description: Built on a swamp, Withergate needed a method to purify and flavor its drinking water. That, my friends, is where soda comes in...

name: Demon Seeds
description: These seeds glow with a faint eerie light, growing quick and providing a fast yield.

name: Snappy Seeds
description: Mind your fingers when you harvest this hungry crop! Slow to grow, but sells for a high value.

name: Shimmeroot Seeds
description: Radiates with a faint golden shimmer, this lucrative root always produces legendary quality yields.

name: Pepper Seeds
description: Spicy, delicious, and more expensive than a typical crop. They grow so hot that they never stay watered overnight.

name: Cinnaberry Seeds
description: A sweet snack that can be eaten on the go or used as an important ingredient in delicious desserts.

name: Grape Seeds
description: Cultivated by Elves around the world, this species of grape is adaptable to many different climates.

name: Indiglow Seeds
description: A lily flower renowned both for its beauty and the beautiful glow it emits upon blossoming.

name: Cat Tail Seeds
description: A seed covered in soft fuzz that feel almost like fur.

name: Darkness Essence Seeds
description: Strange seeds, they'll drop essence of darkness once their flower blooms.

name: Hops Seeds
description: These seeds don't seem to do much hopping.

name: Ghost Pepper Seeds
description: Careful planting these, even the seeds are spicy enough to make you cry!

name: Stormelon Seeds
description: Melon seeds that crackle with a strange magic.

name: Chocoberry Seeds
description: Some people like chewing on these chocolatey seeds, though they're very bitter. Worth much more when grown and used in recipes!

name: Heart Berry Seeds
description: Even the seeds are shaped like little hearts, how adorable.

name: Coffee Bean Seeds
description: You must resist the urge to drink these seeds! Plant them and get even more beans to drink!

name: Cranberry Seeds
description: These seeds normally only grow in bogs, though strangely they grow just fine in Sun Haven.

name: Pea Seeds
description: Plant the peas, please.

name: Cotton Seeds
description: They might seeds, but they feel as soft and fluffy as fresh wool.

name: Honeysuckle Seeds
description: Weird, these seeds don't taste like honey.

name: Candy Cane Seeds
description: Who knew candy canes grew on trees?

name: Snow Pea Seeds
description: These seeds are completely frozen solid!

name: Sun Orb Seeds
description: Glowing with light and warm to the touch, what kind of seeds are these?

name: Lily Seeds
description: These tend to grow the best in tropical wetlands, though they do well enough in a place like Sun Haven.

name: Lotus Seeds
description: Exotic and even a little mysterious, this variety of lotus flower actually blossoms readily on your farm.

name: Blueberry Sprinkles
description: Apparently pets come in flavors, who knew?

name: Whitebelly Shark
description: Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the water.

name: Redeye Piranha
description: Not too difficult a fish to catch, the real challenge is getting it off the hook without losing a finger!

name: Toothy Angler
description: The ghastly light hanging on its head is the perfect tool for navigating Withergate's dark, murky waters.

name: Kelp Eel
description: Often reeled up and mistaken for kelp, the Kelp Eel usually gets tossed back into the water.

name: Royal Koi
description: Not actually related to any royalty, though it is a very pretty looking fish.

name: Princely Frog
description: A crown prince of all things hoppy and green, its rivals at frog court shall surely toast to your catch.

name: Goblin Shark
description: You're unsure if this shark's strange nose makes it look kind of cute, or just kind of freaky.

name: Vampire Squid
description: A blood red vampire squid, many noble families of Withergate incorporate this haunting squid into their house crests.

name: Moonfish
description: A species of sunfish, creatively named "Moonfish", because they live in Withergate. Get it?

name: Viperfish
description: Fangs, poison and a really bad attitude. Definitely not the fish to handle if you don't know what you're doing.

name: Eel-Like-Thing
description: It's... some sort of... eel... like-thing... with a face. Huh.

name: Ribbon Eel
description: An impossibly thin eel, its physiology confounds scholars even to this day.

name: Koi Fish
description: A fish brought to this part of the world from a far away continent, they can grow quite large when they have enough space and food.

name: Bomb Fish
description: It's like any other regular, normal fish... except it explodes!!

name: Icicle Carp
description: A lazy carp that moves so slowly it can sometimes be found with icicles hanging from its fins!

name: Blazing Herring
description: This herring is a lightning fast swimmer, keeping its body running warm even in the cold of winter.

name: Tinder Turtle
description: There's nothing tender about a sea turtle who has a molten volcano for a shell.

name: Flame Ray
description: A ray that looks just like a flying fireball as it glides through the waves.

name: Floral Trout
description: The pattern of this trout's scales are uncannily similar to a floral pattern, hence the name.

name: Seahorse
description: Looks like a little small to ride, sadly.

name: Vampire Piranha
description: So named for its dark red belly and thankfully not for any blood sucking tendencies!

name: Ghostfish
description: A harmless jellyfish that is totally invisible in the water. All the same, however, fishermen consider this spooky jelly to be a sign of bad luck.

name: Autumn Leaf Sole
description: This fish experiences a physical transformation in the fall season, blending in with falling leaves.

name: Orange Tree Seeds
description: These tiny seeds will sprout into a bountiful orange tree once planted.

name: Strawberry Tree Seeds
description: These tiny seeds will sprout into a bountiful strawberry tree once planted.

name: Raspberry Tree Seeds
description: These tiny seeds will sprout into a bountiful raspberry tree once planted.

name: Nel'Vari Tree Seeds
description: Tree nuts that faintly shimmer a myriad of different colors, they'll grow into fantastic Elven trees once planted.

name: Red Rose Bouquet
description: A bundle of bright red roses. Though it may seem like they were bundled without much thought, they were actually placed quite meticulously.

name: Blue Rose Bouquet
description: A bundle of bright blue roses. Though it may seem like they were bundled without much thought, they were actually placed quite meticulously.

name: Epic Fish
description: Any epic fish

name: Mana Drop
description: A droplet of crystalized mana. It pulses and thrums, giving off a gentle glow.

name: Butterfly Statue A
description: A bush, expertly trimmed into the shape of a beautiful butterfly.
